name: The Great Wildebeest Migration
description: Get to Experience this spectacular natural wonder of the world, About 2 million animals have covered 1800 miles for lush greener grass on the Kenyan Side, the only thin between them and the lush grass is the Great Mara River which comes along with its own perilous creatures. This safari is guided by Kelvin Papai who has vast experience in running this tour.
